Title: Prohibits public utilities from using funds or being reimbursed by funds raised from ratepayers for certain activities
Summary: Prohibits public utilities from using funds or being reimbursed by funds raised from ratepayers for contributions or gifts to political candidates, trade associations, public charities, and lobbyists, and for certain travel, entertainment and educational expenditures.
LawCode: Add Art 12 §§240 & 241, amd §5, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to prohibiting public utilities from using funds or being reimbursed by funds raised from ratepayers for certain activities
